title: Anything, Sir A Tale of Two Job Markets in the UAE
link: https://randoms.top/pages/Anything, Sir A Tale of Two Job Markets in the UAE.html
snippet: I’ve been hiring for years. From Dubai to Abu Dhabi, I’ve met candidates from all corners of the world. But there’s one thing that never fails to surprise me: the difference in how candidates from the West and those from Asia or Africa respond when asked a simple question—

title: Do Them Right: A Message to Every Manager in the UAE
link: https://randoms.top/pages/Do Them Right A Message to Every Manager in the UAE.html
snippet: Even if you don’t personally like someone. Even if they’re quiet. Even if they don’t flatter you or laugh at your jokes.
